radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous leukocytes, no organisms including no mycobacteria; pathological examination showed granulomas with necrosis resembling caseation consistent with active tuberculosis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Supraclavicular abscess had resolved the following month.

radiographic_examinations.findings: HIV RNA levels showed a decrease from 2,239,206 to 22,000 copies per ml over the course of treatment.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Despite initial decrease, full viral suppression was not achieved; subsequent follow-ups showed persistent elevation of viral loads.
